amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service to enforce the Endangered Species Act with respect to the Clubshell, Fanshell, Rabbitsfoot, Rayed Bean, Sheepnose or Snuffbox mussels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service to enforce the Endangered Species Act with respect to the Clubshell, Fanshell, Rabbitsfoot, Rayed Bean, Sheepnose or Snuffbox mussels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rokita amendment (A104) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rokita amendment (A104) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A104) offered by Mr. Rokita.
